name: Striker Digital Czech s.r.o.
tagline: Create agency for the digital era.
description:
We believe in team play and collaboration. Great game starts with even greater tactic. We know you also want to take the shot on the digital play field. Fortunately, we shed a lot of sweat, blood and tears to figure out what to do in a situation where you need to hit the spot.
If you play on the same team with us, we can offer you a great deal of perseverance, passion and determination. On the digital front, we run the whole way, from strategy to analysis. And for what we can’t cover, we partner up with other A-players to deliver the best results.
READ MORE...
